actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution endorsing the concept of a commemorative stamp honoring the Revolutionary War Prison Ship Martyrs and urging the United States Postal Service to release, issue, and sell such a stamp.

summary.text: Urges the Postal Service to issue a postage stamp commemorating the Americans who died on British prisonships during the Revolutionary War because they refused to pledge allegiance to England.

titles.title: A resolution endorsing the concept of a commemorative stamp honoring the Revolutionary War Prison Ship Martyrs and urging the United States Postal Service to release, issue, and sell such a stamp.
